reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Big Couch!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Nice big couch, great bargain for the money. Seat cushions are comfortable, but the back cushions are a little flat. It does not come with an ottoman, but luckily we had one to fit perfectly within the middle cushions which makes the couch like a huge bed that a family of four could kick back and watch a movie in. It's very easy to assemble. Just screw in the legs on the three main sections. Then the section snap together. Then fasten the 3 backrests, one per section. You do have to take the the vacuum sealed cushions out of the box 48 to 72 hours before use. Cut the bag open and let them sit and absorb air for about 2 to 3 days, which is standard for any memory foam furniture. All In all, pretty comfortable and looks beautiful .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The couch comes in 3 boxes and 2 arrived on time the other box arrived the next day. The instructions are wrong saying that it arrives in two boxes. The couch is okay it just sits very low and the pillow fall when you get up. It was and easy build and it not that heavy. It’s affordable and the color match the picture. It’s enough room for about 5 people on the couch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars well packaged and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I have to say for the price and time that it took to assemble. It is pretty darn food. very sturdy and well built. very comfortable. and is a good size.

reviews.reviewerName: German Ochoa De La CruzGerman Ochoa De La Cruz
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars OK on a budget
reviews.reviewText: Pros- firm, easy to assemble, will dissemble into 3 pieces for easy moving, visual pleasing.Cons- the back cushions!! So so thin like 2-3 inches. I immediately left the house to go to Marshals to get throw pillows. I only got 4 and I feel like I need to get even more to help with the back support. This couch will be a Den couch when we move for the kids and I will eventually get one that I can stretch more out on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed with this purchase! This was incredibly easy to assemble and took about 90 minutes (mostly unpacking it out of the boxes and vacuum sealed plastic). The upholstery is velvety soft, and the cushions are nicely padded. It appears to be easy to clean. It’s a lot bigger than I was expecting, which makes laying horizontal a lot easier. The arm rests, aka “side pillows”, ARE removable. They are more pillow than anything. I was hoping so when purchasing, but couldn’t really figure out beforehand from the pictures (maybe I should start reading item descriptions idk). Overall, great couch for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This couch is not what I expected. It came in three separate boxes on three separate days.It was very easy to put together on my own. It took me about one hour and a half. This couch is far from comfortable, and is very very low to the ground. I am 5 foot 9 and my legs hang off quite a bit on the ends. The pillows do not stay attached to the back of the couch and the armrest has no structure so you’re not able to really rest your arm. It is not something you would want in your main living room. I don’t have the patience or a large enough car to box all of this up and lug it to a UPS store for a return… I can’t stand it. I’m getting ready to sell it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Huge words of caution before you buy!
reviews.reviewText: One of the 12 legs arrived broken inside of the box. The legs are made of plastic so don’t expect them to hold up for very long. Reached out to CS and they won’t send out a replacement part, and I was told by CS that my only option is to return the couch to Amazon in the three boxes it originally arrived in just to have another whole couch shipped out. Guess who won’t be getting assistance on this matter since the couch is already assembled and in use?Don’t let this be you. Think twice before you decide to go for this couch. The design is nice, the couch is spacious, all cushion covers are removable for washing, and the comfort level is medium firm. But the cons are that the back cushions constantly fall forward as they don’t have anything to grip onto (an easy fix for this is adhesive Velcro straps but you’ll have to make that additional, yet small investment), and you also run the risk of having some type of unseen damage to any part of the couch before unboxing. In this case, there were no punctures/holes/tears/damage to the boxes exterior. An additional investment will have to be made for a full new set of 12 legs as well, since I can’t get an identical replacement for the original leg nor will anything that’s available for purchase on Amazon be a match. And if you decide to go with the cream-colored couch and you have little ones running around or pets, definitely invest in a sofa cover. You won’t find a cover set on Amazon that will match the exact shape of this couch (or anything even close to it), so you will have to order each individual cover part separately for this U shaped sectional. I ended up purchasing an XL chase cover for the base of the middle seating section (as it’s the only cover that can accommodate its dimensions), 4 more XL chase covers for the two chaise bases and their respective seat cushions, 2 standard seat covers for the middle seats, and 4 back cushion covers. When you add up the total cost to each of these, it will cost more than double if not triple than most couch cover sets on Amazon! Unfortunately it’s ANOTHER investment that needs to be made, but you won’t have to constantly go back to spot treat the original fabric or washing the original cushion covers often, and with a couch cover you’re protecting your overall investment.Your best bet is to either go with the gray color option (if it’s in stock), or just throw in the additional $100-$300 and simply go with a pricier, but better off couch. With as much money as I’ve ended up putting into this couch, I would’ve been far better off going with a different sofa.Keep all of these factors in mind before you buy. I hope this helps someone that’s considering purchasing this sectional. I hope you make the right investment for you, your needs, and your lifestyle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, perfect size, and very stable. It's a cheap little sectional. I wouldn't put it in the living room, but it's perfect for my kids to game on. The other reviews are spot on about the back pillows. You'll want to at least get some velcro because they do allover all the time. I'm going to try like another reviewer mentioned and add more stuffing. BUT I still give it 5stars because it's great for the price! I do like it a lot and absolutely would buy it again.
